document_name: Legislation collection: Law of June 19, 2015 modifying the modified law of August 1, 2007 relating to the organization of the natural gas market
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/LUX/2015/LUX-2015-01-01-Legislation collection: Law of June 19, 2015 modifying the modified law of August 1, 2007 relating to the organization of the natural gas market_1f7e01efd645d6fdeb3cea95ab61feeb.pdf
document_description: The law amends a number of articles of the law of August 1st, 2007, on the natural gas market. The law seeks to improve the environmental footprint of the natural gas market as well as energy efficiency on the supply and distribution side.  The law obliges natural gas suppliers to purchase the production of biogas, gas produced by biomass or other types of gas based on renewable resources, to inject it in their networks. The law also sets targets of energy savings for suppliers.
